DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Japan . The aim clinical trial investigate effect NN1250 ( insulin degludec ) Japanese subject type 1 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Investigating Effect NN1250 Japanese Subjects With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetes mellitus ( diagnose clinically ) least 12 month Treated multiple daily insulin injection continuous subcutaneous insulin infusion ( CSII ) least 12 month Current daily basal insulin requirement equal 0.3 ( I ) U/kg/day Glycosylated haemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) equal 10.0 % ( one retest within week permit result last test conclusive ) Subject donate blood plasma past month 500 mL within 3 month prior screen Surgery trauma significant blood loss ( 500 mL ) within last 3 month prior screen Smoker ( define subject smoke 5 cigarette equivalent per day ) Not able willing refrain smoking use nicotine gum transdermal nicotine patch inpatient period ( clamp period )
